mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FREE_POST (ID, FREE_POST_TITLE, FREE_POST_CONTENT, FREE_POST_CREATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_FREE_POST.NEXTVAL, #{freePostTitle}, #{freePostContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_FREE_POST
WHERE FREE_POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR FREE_POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT ID, FREE_POST_TITLE, FREE_POST_CONTENT, FREE_POST_CREATE_DATE, LIKE_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM ( SELECT ID, FREE_POST_TITLE, FREE_POST_CONTENT, FREE_POST_CREATE_DATE, LIKE_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID FROM TBL_EVENT WHERE FREE_POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR FREE_POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT MIN(ID) AS NEXT_SEQUENCE FROM TBL_EVENT WHERE ID > #{id}
SELECT MAX(ID) AS PREVIOUS_SEQUENCE FROM TBL_EVENT WHERE #{id} > ID
